title: Awesome Value- Corner 2 Bed! Hardwood/ F-C Windows/ Luxury Finish/ WD
neighborhood: South Loop, Printers Row, Grant Park, CTA
posting_body: Call or Email to schedule a tour.
We are available for tours 7 days a week.
Pictures are representative samples of the advertised unit.
In some cases, the actual units you tour may vary from the pictures based on the specific floor plan available.
Availability and prices are subject to change (and often do change daily).

Addresses, cross-streets or other geographic information, if provided, is intended to provide a general location of the advertised unit only; you should not rely on any address provided in this advertisement as an exact location of the unit.
Please contact us for exact addresses.
Units are leased unfurnished unless otherwise specified.
12-month minimum lease term is standard for most units, but minimum term varies.
